channel.title: Can somone help with with somthing please?
channel.description:
hai can you render these images to there is no white on them and just to the right put text please?
[img]http://cp7.awardspace.com/images/hosting_forum.png[/img] text: gallery [img]http://cp7.awardspace.com/images/account_information.png[/img]text: Login [img]http://cp7.awardspace.com/images/webalizer.png[/img]text: Usefull Infomation [img]http://cp7.awardspace.com/images/account_password.png[/img]text: Regester
if you could do that i would be so greatfull btw you will be put in the credits
